channel.title: Need Help Compiling
channel.description:
Ok so iv been trying to fix this all night. i just fixed my run.bat and got it to work with java7 but now i cant get my compiler to work.
this is what fixed my run.bat [code]@echo off title JcorscapeBeta java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause[/code]
Heres my Compiler code and i get and error with path but my path is right.
Compiler: [code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/code]

superman please check my compiler post i cant freken figure it out

item.title: Need Help Compiling
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Ok so iv been trying to fix this all night. i just fixed my run.bat and got it to work with java7 but now i cant get my compiler to work.

this is what fixed my run.bat

@echo off title JcorscapeBeta java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause

Heres my Compiler code and i get and error with path but my path is right.

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
